thread.title: Swatch launches a $90 payments watch in China
thread.title_full: Swatch launches a $90 payments watch in China - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Swatch launches a $90 payments watch in China
text: Swatch launched a new NFC-enabled payments watch for the China market at an event in Shanghai on Wednesday, due to be rolled out from January next year (and coming to the U.S. and Switzerland after that). To do so, Swatch has teamed up with China UnionPay and the Bank of Communications. The Swatch Bellamy represents the company’s entrance into the contactless payment […] »
